Summary: fireballs playing tag among san francisco skyscrapers
divs: Sighting Detailswas listening to radioof the (fireballs playing tag among the skyscrapers at unamagional speeds. at 1000 mph' these ufo moved like halograms. newspaper photographers took pictures which showed up ij the san francisco chronicle rhe next day. the chronicle must still have the original photos. i've never seen these pictures on tv?at that time there were so many ufo's in the bay area'they didn't even draw attn you could see them almost ant time of the day.anything that wasn't an airplane was automaticly called a weatherballoon. the planes at Moffett air base even quit chasing the ufo's
